channel.title: beginner on I Prefer Jim
channel.description: Recent content in beginner on I Prefer Jim

item.title: Review “Learning 2D Game Development with Unity: A Hands-On Guide to Game Creation”
item.description: I’ve just finished reading Learning 2D Game Development with Unity: A Hands-On Guide to Game Creation, and I really enjoyed it despite many issues with the actual text (I’ll try to cover everything here).

item.title: Your First App: Node.js is complete!
item.description: I’m stoked to announce that I’ve finished writing my first self-published book, Your First App: node.js. The book is a full-stack application development tutorial using what is commonly known as the ‘MEAN’ stack, but with a heavier focus on the backend technologies: node.

item.title: What is node.js?
item.description: I’ve recently decided to write a book about node.js. I don’t feel like a lot of books out there (on any technology) cover real-world scenarios.
